charges.charge_description: T.21:846 - Conspiracy to Distribute and Possess with Intent to Distribute Heroin, sch I narcotic and T.21:853 - Forfeiture Allegation(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed on Gov't motion at Guilty Plea

charges.charge_description: Title 21, United States Code, Sections 841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(C) - Possess with Intent to Distribute Heroin/Title 21, United States Code, Section 853 - Forfeiture Allegation(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Eighty (80) months imprisonment; Three (3) years supervised release; $100 special assessment

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(C) - Distribution of a Mixture and Substance Containing a Detectable Amount of Heroin, sch I narcotic(2-3)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed on Gov't motion at Guilty Plea

charges.charge_description: Title 18, United States Code, Section 924(c)(1)(A)- Possess Firearm in  Furtherance of  Drug Trafficking(2s)

charges.charge_disposition: Sixty (60) months imprisonment, to be served consecutive to Count 1s; Five (5) years supervised release, to run concurrently; $100 special assessment
